code: import React from'react';import{useAllContext}from'../../App';import'../../Styles/ShowPopupBox.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowPopupDeleteTask=()=>{const StatesAndFunctions=useAllContext();const popupSelectedTaskDetails=StatesAndFunctions.currentSelectedTaskDetails;const handleDeleteTaskClick=(e,approvalStatus)=>{e.preventDefault();approvalStatus&&StatesAndFunctions.deleteTask(popupSelectedTaskDetails);StatesAndFunctions.changePopupMessageBox('',{});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"popup_container_wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"popup_container_header",children:"Confirm Deletion"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"popup_container_inner_wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"popup_inner_boxes",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Are you sure you want to delete? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{onClick:()=>StatesAndFunctions.changePopupMessageBox('show-task',popupSelectedTaskDetails),children:popupSelectedTaskDetails.taskName})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"popup_inner_boxes",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",id:"popupform_submit_btn",className:"popup_btn",onClick:e=>handleDeleteTaskClick(e,true),children:"Yes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",id:"popupform_submit_btn",className:"popup_btn",onClick:e=>handleDeleteTaskClick(e,false),children:"No"})]})]})]});};export default ShowPopupDeleteTask;
